name: InterPixelArt
description:
You are an alien looking for your way home... but your spaceship needs to assemble in order to be ready.

The spaceship pieces have different colors and forms and you will have to connect them to get points (watch out for the physics!). The points will gradually make your spaceship appear so you can finally return.

Mechanics include day and night scenes upping the difficulty, meteor obstacles, points by pieces color + form and collisions.

Are you ready? Let's find a fun way to go home!

Made for the Global Game Jam 2019 by:

Sabrina Rivero - Production
Juan Corbat - Development
Marcos Juri - Development
Kevin Miles - Game Art / Tech Art
Francisco Casademont - Music & SFX

Special thanks to Dario Herrero for all his support, which allowed us to participate in the event.
